title: Research Guides: Dentistry & Dental Hygiene: Current Dentistry Research
author: Ashley Purvis
description: Research Guides: Dentistry & Dental Hygiene: Current Dentistry Research
cleaned_text: blog (that now has a podcast!) that provides brief summaries highlighting evidence-based publications relevant to dental practice around the world. Follow the site to be the first to hear about key systematic reviews, trials, and guidance as well as high quality patient information.
